message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $20,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Can you meet me halfway?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $12,000 is too low, I'm willing to come down to $18,000. This product offers significant value, and I'm confident you'll see a return on your investment.
I understand the value of the product, but $18,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $12,000 and $18,000. How about $15,000?
